title: Schema
description: Required fields and terms for metadata written for USFWS Alaska Region data dictionaries.

errorMessage.const: The role for the 'Responsible Party' under the 'Main' tab must be 'pointOfContact'.

required.role: A contact must be provided for the data dictionary with the role 'pointOfContact' in the 'Responsible Party' section under the 'Main' tab.
required.party: A contact must be provided for the data dictionary in the 'Responsible Party' section under the 'Main' tab.

required.date: A date must be provided in the 'Basic Information' section under the 'Citation' tab.
required.dateType: A date type must be provided for a date in the 'Basic Information' section under the 'Citation' tab. At least one date type must be 'creation'.

errorMessage.const: At least one date type must be 'creation' in the 'Basic Information' section under the 'Citation' tab.

required.title: A title must be provided for the data dictionary in the 'Basic Information' section under the 'Main' tab.
required.date: A date (e.g. creation, revision) must be provided for the data dictionary in the 'Basic Information' section under the 'Citation' tab.
required.responsibleParty: Responsible parties must be provided for the data dictionary under the 'Citation' tab.

required.name: A descriptive name associated with a domain value (Domain Item Name) must be provided in the 'Domain Items' section under the 'Domain' tab.
required.value: A domain value must be provided in the 'Domain Items' section under the 'Domain' tab.
required.definitions: A definition for a domain value must be provided in the 'Domain Items' section under the 'Domain' tab.

required.codeName: A code name for the domain (defined value list) must be provided in the 'Domain Informaion' section under the 'Domains' tab.
required.description: A description for the domain (defined value list) must be provided in the 'Domain Information' section under the 'Domain' tab.
required.domainItem: At least one domain item must be provided for the domain (defined value list).

required.codeName: Provide a code name used to identify an attribute in the 'Attributes' section under the 'Entities' tab. Most often this will be the table or speadsheet column name.
required.definition: Provide a succinct but comprehensive definition for the attribute in the 'Attributes' section under the 'Entities' tab.
required.dataType: Provide a data type for the attribute in the 'Attributes' section under the 'Entities' tab.
required.allowNull: Indicate whether null values are allowed for an attribute in the 'Attributes' section under the 'Entities' tab.

required.commonName: Provide a common name used to identify the entity in the 'Entity Information' section under the 'Entities' tab.
required.codeName: Provide a code name used to identify the entity in a database schema or application software in the 'Entity Information' section under the 'Entities' tab. For spreadsheets, this would likely be the sheet name.
required.definition: Provide a brief definition for the entity in the 'Entity Information' section under the 'Entities' tab.
required.attribute: Provide at least one attribute (column or field) for an entity under the 'Entities' tab.

required.subject: A resource type must be provided for the subject of the data dictionary in the 'Basic Information' section under the 'Main' tab.
required.responsibleParty: A point of contact must be provided for the data dictionary in the 'Responsible Party' section under the 'Main' tab.
required.citation: Citation information must be provided for the data dictionary under the 'Citation' tab.
required.entity: Information about entities (tables) and attributes (columns or fields) must be provided under the 'Entities' tab.
